values:
Well, I've been looking forward to tonights Christmas party at church for a long time now... but I went there and I had fun... but at the end it just hurt, and then Mom's observations on the way home didn't help any.  So yeah, I hope everyone else had a good time there.  I'm done talking.

Kawaii34Girl
...becasue 3/4 r cute.
http://kawaii34girl.livejournal.com/6690.html

Well, today was fun.  It was like, -10 degrees out today.  But besides the brutal cold, today was a good day.  After church there was a dinner, lunch thingy.  (Becasue er baptists gatta have out food ^_~)  But it was a lot of fun, I sat with a really fun family, and it was just plain awesome!  So then after that, me and mom went shopping for the rest of my friends and stuff, I got mom the Celine Dion spray that she's been dieying to get, so I know that she'll be a happy camper this christmas ^^  On the 18th my youth group went Christmas shopping... that was fun too!  (wow... my life's been REALLY fun lately!!!!!)  But anyway, my Dad got me a necklace the other day, and it really means a lot, I haven't taken it off since he put it on me (and I don't plan on taking it off either!!!!!)  But uh.... Dad made mom open her gift from him about an hour ago... it was......a..... PRINTER with a scanner, copeyer, and a whole bunch of other awesome junk!!!!!  But anyway, I gatta go up-date "My Otaku".  (It's an AWESOME site... and I HIGHLY reccomend it to anime lovers out there!  you get you're own personal web-site, archives for art, archives for quizes and it has an AMAZING forum.  Man, I could just go on-and-on!  But since I'm guessing that all of you have better things to do with you're time, I won't ^^)

So yeah, my user-name is Kawaii34Girl (surprise, surprise)  But once I get my site under-way, I'll give yall a linkie ^^

Does anyone know the name of the song that they play for the commercial for "Kingdom Hearts: Chain of Memories".  I think it's the prettiest song ever!  I wanna hear the whole thing, so if u know the title, it would be a HUGE help to lemme know the title ^^

ttyl!  Love ya all!!!!!  Merry Christmas!!!

(speaking of that... is it just me... or does it not even feel like Christmas yet!?!?!  Even after putting the tree up, decorating it, the youth group shopping trip, wrapping presents, giving presents and all of that good stuff, it just doesn't seem like Christmas.  But I know that the night before, I'll get all eager, and then as soon as I finally feel in-season... it'll all be over.  Sad, eh?)

Kawaii34Girl
...because 3/4 r cute.
http://kawaii34girl.livejournal.com/6588.html

please give me a glomp!!!!

*HUGS* TOTAL! give Kawaii34Girl more *HUGS*
Get hugs of your own
Thankies ^^ But anyway, life has been great for the last 4 days. I don't feel like explaining it, so tuff cookies ^^ Kawaii34Girl ...because 3/4 r cute.
http://kawaii34girl.livejournal.com/6189.html

hey hey hey

Well, life's been okay.  I don't think I could complain... too bad ^_~  But yeah, FF.net, looking up sites,  music, drawing, tracing (A City with no People from Chobits!  Yay for the bunnies!!!) and a few games at Neopets has made up my life. Fun fun!

I spent the night at Poki-chan and Clari-chan's house the other night, and that was fun!  We watched "Dawn of the Dead", read 2 new Chobits, drew and played DDR (even though they didn't have the mat!)

And that was my 1st time playing DDR.... so I wasn't very good, lol!  My friends decided that the song from there, "Butterfly" is my song.  Once I got home and looked up the lyrics, I realized that I had read a song-fic about it.  So that's awesome!

Well, I like somone... but I have no chances with him.  But then my ex was being a total sweetie.  I mean, he made me feel really good about myself, and I just felt really good when I was talking to him and stuff.  But then I remembered that he isn't a Christian, so I had to decline when he told me he loved me and asked me out.  MAN!  That was REALLY hard...

But a good friend from Life Changers came to visit me the day before Thanksgiving, and that was really special.  (Love-ya Nick!)  I g2g soon, so I'll explain that event later.

Well, I had 3 REALLY fun dreams last night!  They were really crazy, but some really good things happened!  And it was a LOT OF FUN!  I almost cried when I woke up.

But anyway, sorry for the lack of up-dates, I'll try to be better about that.

Kawaii34Girl
http://kawaii34girl.livejournal.com/6135.html

Well, I went on a family vacation to NC with my mom and sister.  I have gotten into a new fandom (I'm pretty sure you can tell by my new piccie)  but anyway, that's my all-time fav-couple.  I'm now over Shane and onto somone else.  Yes, I do know that I'm pathetic.  Well, I haven't up-dated in awhile, I guess I'm done.

Kawaii34Girl
...because 3/4 r cute.
http://kawaii34girl.livejournal.com/5871.html

Okey, I went to a football game and uh... we were planing to go TP-ing... but things changed and I couldn't.  So yeah, that got me upset.  I went home and listened to Akeboshi's song, Wind.

"Cultivate your hunger before you idealize.
Motivate your anger to make them all realize.
Climbing the mountain, never coming down.
Break into the contents, never falling down.

My knee is still shaking, like I was twelve,
Sneaking out of the classroom, by the back door.
A man railed at me twice though, but I didn't care.
Waiting is wasting for people like me.

Don't try to live so wise.
Don't cry 'cause you're so right.
Don't dry with fakes or fears,
'Cause you will hate yourself in the end.

Don't try to live so wise.
Don't cry 'cause you're so right.
Don't dry with fakes or fears,
'Cause you will hate yourself in the end.

You say, "Dreams are dreams.
"I ain't gonna play the fool anymore."
You say, "'Cause I still got my soul."

Take your time, baby, your blood needs slowing down.
Breach your soul to reach yourself before you gloom.
Reflection of fear makes shadows of nothing, shadows of nothing.

You still are blind, if you see a winding road,
'Cause there's always a straight way to the point you see.

Don't try to live so wise.
Don't cry 'cause you're so right.
Don't dry with fakes or fears,
'Cause you will hate yourself in the end.

I figured that I've talked about that song enough, and that it was about time that I posted it.  But that's my fav. song.  I suggest that u download it and give it a chance.

I spent the day at Grandma's house.  I had fun, we rented some movies and stuff.  I got 2 REALLY cute shirts and 2 sketch books and some pencils and erasers.  G2G!!!!!
http://kawaii34girl.livejournal.com/5575.html

Yeah.  Last night I stayed up awhile drawing.  I got a pretty good ways done on this picture.  This girl is sitting down at the edge of some water and she's reaching the water.  Yeah, ask if u wanna see it.  I've been feelin' pretty good because for the last 2 nights, I've done 110 sit ups, 15 squat-jumps, 3 mins and 23 seconds of bikes and 12 push-ups.  Yes, I wonder how long I can manage to keep this up...

I had a lot of fun in my dreams last night.  I had a lot to do with Life Changers, the Genesee County Fair, the Naruto cast and my family down south.  Yeah, last night was A LOT of fun!  ^_^  But I got up and we went to the Christian Family Bookstore and I got my homeschooling stuff.  **points a finger towards throat and gags**  But anyway, I'm glad because I only have 4 subjects!!!!!  I do my devotions so that will count as Bible class, and I'm doing my own thing for art.  I'll probably take a swimming lesson once we get back from North Carolina.  We should be leaving in about 2-3 weeks.  And we should be gone for about a month.

At the bookstore, I also got this REALLY kawaii (cute) shirt.  I'll be wearing it on this Wed.  But uh... I got back and cut the lawn.  **another finger pointed down throte and gaging sound**  But uh... I got back in, had a bagle, tried to finish the lawn... but the mower (push) wouldn't start, went inside and finished my piccie.  I guess that's all I did today.

It's kind of wierd thinking that I'm starting High School.  I remember that whenever I would play house or something, and whenever we decieded what age we wanted to be, I ALWAYS wanted to be 16 and in high school.  And, I'm getting there.  It's just scary thinking that I could take Drivers Ed next summer.

But anyway, I'm done with my whole realization thingey-ma-jigger ^_^

Love you with all the love that I uh.. man, I can't think of a good one...

                   Katie

"Sorry, today I got lost on the road of life."

"Sakura, when it hurts, eat the chocolate."

                       ~Kakashi
http://kawaii34girl.livejournal.com/5188.html

Okey, for those of you who don't know, Ohayo means good-morning in JP.  And Konnichiwa means good evening.  So now ya know!  I got up, got on-line, read some FF's.  Yeah... same old, same old.  4 of the FF's that I've been reading have been up-dated.  So Katie's happy!  They were CHOU KAWAII!!!  (So cute)  Yeah...  I was REALLY in a drawing mood last night, so I started drawing ^^  And uh... I rock because I don't start school yet!  Uh... That's about all my social life consists of...  TTYL!

Love you with all the love that I need to get a social life...

                           Katie

"Sorry, today I got lost on the road of life."

"Sakura, when it hurts, eat the chocolate."

                ~Kakashi
http://kawaii34girl.livejournal.com/5044.html

Last night, I got my ring.  BUT... it's too big!!!  5 is just barely too small and 6 is too big.  I have a cloth between the ring and my finger so it doesn't fall off!!!  But yeah.  I was really worried because mom has been telling me to just call Shane and ask him what the deal is with all of these mixed messages.  But I'm way too freaking nervous to do something like that.  So Mom helped me write out a note.  I was planning to give it to him between Sunday School and the service.  BUT... I wasn't woken up for church and here I am!  **sigh**  After 7 months, I was hoping on FINALLY getting some answers.  But now I have to either do it tonight or wait another week!!  But I got up, read some FF's and and began writing my own.  My one story has 159 reviews... and my other one only has 1, lol.  So I'm still dissapointed that I couldn't go this morning, and I'm nervous for tonight.  Pray for me!  I guess that's all!

Love you guys with all the love I have instead of guts,

                            Katie

"Sorry, today I got lost on the road of life."

"Sakura, when it hurts, eat the chocolate."

                              -Kakashi
http://kawaii34girl.livejournal.com/4654.html

Well, I haven't really up-dated in a few days, SRY!  I went to some friends from my old church to set up this home schooling program worked out.  We went swimming too.  Then I went to the store to get Sarah's gift.  Then I got home, then I went to Sarah's 18th B-day party.  Me and Megan had a blast as we were 'fighting' over somone. But it was all in good fun.  Now Sarah's parents officially think I'm wierd, lol.  It was fun.  I got home around 1:30, then I stayed up writing until about 2. (That's when mom came in my room and MADE me go to sleep!)

This morning I've been a total couch potato.  I've been on the computer almost all day (except for when I called Taryn) but then she wanted me to send her this file, so here I am!

I printed out that story, the one about my fav. charactor.  It's just really sad, and it hits ya right here.  **places a hand over heart**

Uh... my purity ring came in at the Family bookstore!  And my sister stuch a presant bow on the top of my arm and said "here Katie, now you're the school president!"  I guess it's something from TV this morning... Well, I accidentaly left it on, and it's been a *few* hours, and now it won't come off... it hurts!!!!  Well, I guess that's all!

Love you with all the love that uh... Taryn has for Gaara!
                Katie

"Sorry, today I got lost on the road of life."

"Sakura, when it hurts, eat the choclate...!"

          ~Kakashi
http://kawaii34girl.livejournal.com/4417.html

Yup, I just read the saddest thing on Earth... It's a FF.  I didn't really care for the escond chapter, but the 1st and 3rd were good!  It was all about my all-time favorite charactor, Hatake Kakashi.  Basicly, it was about where he got his sharingan from, how his bestfriend died, and it also included the death of his fience and the fact that his father over-worked him so that he could pass chuunin at the age of 6.  I had a tear going down my face, it was soooo sad!!!  Poor Kakashi...  And what made it even better was because, okey... it starts where he wakes up and sees a picture frame of him and his teammates.  Then, after he takes a walk down memory lane, he goes and meets up with his students.  Now, this part actuelly happens in the show, they question him why he was late, and he simply replies.  "Sorry, I got lost on the road of life." Is that not the most perfect ending!?!  OMGSH, I GATTA make that my lil'siggy for my enteries!!!  Here's the link, just in case you wanna check out the 1st chappie.  The 2nd kinda killed the story for me, but the 3rd was just ok.  So... just read the 1st!  Even though you probably don't know anything about Naruto, I'll leave it here anywayz ^^

http://www.fanfiction.net/s/1963610/1/

So yeah, ENJOY!

Love you with all the reasons Kakashi is my fav. charactor,

                     Katie

 

"Sorry, today I got lost on the road of life."

                             - Hatake Kakashi
http://kawaii34girl.livejournal.com/4220.html

Okey, the other 2 nights, I was at Taryns' house.  (Taryn aka Poki-chan and Kissi-chan!)  However, she comes back with WAFF-chan and Maru-chan, so we're all good!  We were doing a Naruto RP using our OC's.  Mine is Kyasarian (Kya-chan) and her charactor Keira-chan.  I'm Kakashi and Kuranias'daughter.  I'm also a leaf chuunin.  My charactor is in a hospital room.  She's been there since she was stabbed by a kunai that was ment for her charactor, they followed her from the sand village!  Shino has an AWESOME voice, so I'm going for him!  Keira's going for Gaara.  CHOU KAWAII!!!!!  (SO CUTE!!!!!)  But anyway, we had fun.  My hospital is covered with calla lily's because they all love me sooo much ^^

But anyway, I'm now spending the night at Lindsy's house.  Yeah, she said that she wants to try an all nighter, but she never makes it ^^  But anyway, uh... yeah.I think I'm about to read some Naruto FF's, so this should be fun ^^  I'll ttyl.  And, just pray for me... I've been having some things that would require you're prayer!  Actuelly, 2 of them.  So 2 unspokens for me!

Love you with all the sleep I'm gunna need tonight...

                           Katie
http://kawaii34girl.livejournal.com/4066.html

Yeah, EVERY NIGHT since the whole 'movie incident', I've been havind dreams about S****.  Not plesant ones that give me hope or contentment, but ones taht laugh in my face.  They tear away every piece of hope I have left.  They make me feel stupid for my ambitions and dreams.  Like, last night, I had a dream that Megan Suzkent (spelling...) and Shane started going out.  It wasn't calm, it was almost in spite.

It's kinda funny, because Megan has no taste in S**** what-so-ever, and she wouldn't be mean to me like that.  We're buds!

And this is where ANOTHER part of the song, 'Everytime' comes in.

"And when I see you in my dreams, I see you're face.  It's haunting me..."

and "Each night I pray, that soon you're face will fade away."

I drew a piccie of this girl sleeping and thoe words above and below her.  I'm glad how well it turned out.  I'm all out of room in my artbook.  S**** wanted to see it, but it had a picture that ment personal meaning in it, and I didn't want him to laugh.  It was a dirl leaning against a Cherry tree.  And the cherry blossems (sakura) blowing in the wind.  She has a tear flowing down her face.  Below it, it has written.

"And everytime I try to fly, I fall, without my wings.  I feel so small."

So yeah, I guess that's about it.  I read some WAFF ff's and and eat some Taco Bell.
http://kawaii34girl.livejournal.com/3702.html

Okey, I just took some of those 'personality quizes', and I REALLY wanna post some of it here!  BUT... I can't figure out how to use the HTML on LJ.  Anyone willing to help...?

~Katie~
http://kawaii34girl.livejournal.com/3504.html

Yeah.  I haven't up-dated in a while because... I got REALLY excited, then REALLY dissapointed.  Then I got my hopes back up, then I got dissapointed (again!).  Then, I FINALLY gained contentment with the entire situation after I had FINALLY given it up to the Lord.  THEN, I was doing my devotions last night, and I realized that it was a matter of patience.  And I realized that I would be tested soon.  I DIDN'T EXPECT IT TO BE THE NEXT DAY!!!!!  But yeah, I was just like, balling my eyes out in the car today.  I promised mydelf not to cry, I played Akeobishi: Wind over and over in my head.  But it broke at the stupidest remark in the world!!!!!

So yeah, I feel bad.  And just pray for me, and the whole patience and trusting God's plan.  And pray for the trials I've been facing lately.  Help me to not focus on it too much.  And yeah, thanks a lot!!!

I love you with all of the love God gives me!
                Katie

Oh yeah!  And for the song, Everytime...  It fits my mood almost perfectly.  There are only about 3 sentances that don't apply to me.  But needless to say, this song has been playing on repeat for a LOOOOOOONG time now...  It was there at the event that crushed me most, and it's pretty, calming and it fits almost perfectly!  Too bad it's sung by Britney Spears, O-well!!!
http://kawaii34girl.livejournal.com/3324.html

Well, last night I spent the night at my friends house.  We were going on a walk through the woods, and we just stopped.  Both of my friends had an emotional break-down.  In the end, I was given the oppertunity to lead my friend to Christ.  Please keep her in you're prayers.  And pray for her sister, who didn't accept Christ.

We had written a FF, it turned out to be 25 pages in the end, and it's filled to the top with WAFF (Warm And Fuzzy Feelings), Fluff and cavity-enducing sweetness.  It has all of our favorite Naruto couples: Shikamaru/Ino, Naruto/Hinata, Neji/TenTen, Kiba/Kaylee, Shino/Kyasarian and Broccoli/Sakura!

It was SOOOOOOOOOOOOOO fun to write!  We were going like 'awwwwwwwwwwwwww' the entire time!!!!

We went for a bike ride, then we did some other things, now I'm home and doing nothing much.

Monday is comming steadily apon me.  I feel like I'm about to explode from all of the excitement.  **sigh**  I have GOT to try and relaxe...

Love you with all the love I have to give instead of patience!

                                       Katie
http://kawaii34girl.livejournal.com/2913.html

AHHHHHHHHH!  One of the best things in the world happened to me just a short while ago!!!!!  I've been squealing every time I think about it, I can't sit still long enough to type the whloe thing out!  So... if u wanna know the reason, ask meh!!!!!

Love you with all the love... uh... I can't think of anything!!!!
              Katie
http://kawaii34girl.livejournal.com/2569.html

Yeah.  Like it says... I didn't sleep well last night.  I was tossing and turning ALL night long.  I went to bed a lil' after 2, and I got up at 3 mins to 7.  So that's about 5 hours of sleep.  (if it even deserves to be called sleep...)  Uh... this means I have more time to read FF's!!!  Crud, none of the good ones are up-dated!!!  **sigh**  I'll find something to keep me busy...

Love you with all the sleep I need!!!

               Katie
http://kawaii34girl.livejournal.com/2120.html

Today went by average.  I got up and I was home alone.  So I got on the computer.  I read the most ADORABLE Hinata FF.  **sigh**  WHY CAN'T I BE HINATA!?!?!  Then I read an even more adorable Ino/Shikamaru FF.  **sigh**  Mom got here with a purity ring.  Ya know, a stearling silver, it has "True Love Waits".  Well, it was a size 7... and that was WAY too big.  We went up to the store and looked around.  They had a size 5, so I tried it on.  It went on with a little bit of room to spare... but it wouldn't come off!!! It was really funny, but we got the ring off.  So yeah, I'm a size 6.  They had size 5, 7, 8, 9 and 10.  NO 6!!!!! so we ordered a size 6.  It should be in around 2-3 weeks.  Mom got a Selah cd along with Fernando Ortega.  Not my exact taste in music...  I was looking at the new Switchfoot cd.  But ANYWAY...

I got home and got ready to go to VBS and church.  I met up w/ Tiffany.  We talked and sat on her bro's car and went through my purse and such.  Church started, it was fun.  Me and some other people were gunna go get ice-cream.  So I got the money from Mom and she went home.  BUT... they decided to cancel the trip on me.  (after mom left...)  So I got a ride home w/ a family at my church.

I got home and get on the computer, talked to a few million people about S****.  (My friend was watching him durring the 2nd 1/2 of church and claimed that he was looking at me 4x!!!)

But yeah, here I am!  I think I'm gunna do something.  I have no idea what... I think I'm gunna go do my devotions for tonight.

Love you with all the love I'm feeling for the adorability of Shikamaru/Ino!!!

                                             Katie
http://kawaii34girl.livejournal.com/1985.html

I decided to go to VBS (Vacation Bible School) with my little sister.  I had heard that some of the Youth Group was there, so I went!  I went into the sanctuary and saw a small group of kids.  (no more then 10)  I sat down with my little sister.  She had to go to the bathroom towards the end, so mom took her.  The woman in front of me was trying to get the small group of kids to settle down and pay attention.  I didn't just wanna sit there like a fool, so in a voice I could hardly hear I said "Come on you guys."  Or something like that.  The lady turned to face me and spoke harshley.  "Listen..........  we already have enough helpers."  But it was in such a harsh tone...So yeah, I was up-sat.  But I just nodded dumbley, 1/2 in shock of her sudden out-burst and 1/2 because I didn't wanna appear disrespectfull.

I counted out 1 min and 1/2, and then I left.  (I'm PMS'ing!!!) and also, I wouldn't allow myself to cry through the whole S**** incident and durring any time since then.  I haven't cried since Texas Chainsaw Massacre.  (More like wimpering...)  But I finally went outside, sat sown, and just let myself cry.  I cried like there was no tomorrow.  Not so much as to what she said, but everything piling up before that!

I went out to the pond and dipped my feet in the water, it felt so nice and warm!!!

Well, I found a friend from Life Changers, and then we were hanging out downstares where the games were held.  After awhile, we went outside and dipped our feet in the pond, then we were walking through the mud-pit.  (Now THAT was awesome!)  and then we rinsed off out legs in the pond.  I had mud up to my mid-theigh!  We swapped s/n's...(again!)

Me, mom and my sis went out to get dinner.  (love those Mozerella sticks from Arby's!!!)  but yeah, here I am!  I was looking for the moe-town song, My Girl, but I couldn't find it.  So THAT'S frusteration.  I guess that's all!  I'm gunna go draw Broccoli now!  (No, not broccoli the vegetable, but a charactor named Rock Lee.  He wars all green, so I just call him Broccoli!)

love you with all the love Naruto can give Hinata someday!!!

                          Katie
http://kawaii34girl.livejournal.com/1699.html

He just got on-line.  I really wanna talk to him, but I don't wanna bug him.  **inhales deepley**  Lord be with me...

I just now sent him an IM.  I'm covered with goosebumps.  He hasn't responded yet.  I knew I shouldn't have of started a conversation... BUT NOOOOOO.  I just had tos end the stupid im!  I should have of listened to that voice in the back of my head... **sigh**  oh-well!

I got up this morning and started reading ADORABLE FF's.  I'm loving the Hinata/Naruto-ness.  She thinks of him the same way I think of my crush.  It's adorable reading them!!!

He got off, not a word was spoken...erm... typed to me.oh-well.  no good living in the past.

The next day, I went swimming, went to the park, went on a bike ride, went swimming again, went to the corner store and such.  So basicly, I was really busy and kept active.  That night, we went to eat at Grandma's house.  I felt...really...uncomfortable.  I'm not sure why, I just did.  then we went to Dad's friend's house.  His whife was very kind to me.  She was so complimentary and seemed so interested in what I had to say.  It felt good.  I was telling her about Life Changers, she's thinking about volunteering.

I went home and slept really well.  The next day was Sunday, I did NOT wanna get up.  But I eventuelly did. I just sorta modify my personality so I'll fit in better.

A friend asked me if I would like to go put-putting, sounds great!  We went with her b/f and 2 other people in the youth group.  I felt like I was annoying  everyone.  Looking back at some of my actions, and some of the stupid things I said, it's no wonder I feel like a pest when the day is done.

I got home to an empty house.  I got on-line and started downloading Naruto music.  Then I started reading some FF's and drawing a picture of Haku.  I think it turned out rather well... if we ever get a scanner, I'll show u!

I loaded this one song from Naruto, and I was thinking about S****.  I went out-side in my yard and cut a rose.  It's now drying up-side down in my room.  Just a reminder that he doesn't like me now, but I'm okey.

Mom rented this movie, "The Other Side of Heaven".  It was really good.  I loved it.  It's one of those movies where you don't wanna see it, but you know in the end that you'll like it.

Today, I got up and started downloading more music and reading more FF's.  I got in contact with a friend from Life Changers, so that's pretty cool.  I've been listening to "She Will be Loved" by Maroon 5 a lot latley.  It just reminds my that someday, "I Will be Loved".  I guess that's all to catch up on!

Love u all!
